Detailed Description

This file declare useful functions and types for the VISHNU configure option command.

Author:

Function Documentation

void commonConfigure ( boost::shared_ptr< Options >  opt,
int  ac,
char *  av[],
const ConfigureCallBackType &  conf_func 
)

A common function betwenn the VISHNU configure option command and the VISHNU configure default option command.

Parameters:
opt,: Describes all allowed options for the command
ac : The number of parameters the command takes
av : The name of all of that parameters
conf_func,: The VISHNU API function, configureOption our ConfigureDefaultOption
void makeConfigureOptions ( boost::shared_ptr< Options >  opt,
std::string &  dietConfig,
StringcallBackType &  fOptionName,
StringcallBackType &  fValue 
)

To build options for the VISHNU configure option command.

Parameters:
opt,: Describes all allowed options for the VISHNU configure option command
dietConfig,: Represents the VISHNU config file
fOptionName : A callback for the option name
fValue : A callback for the option value
